attrs.name: configs
attrs.desc: Configuration options such as dates, scale, and controls

attrs.name: scale
attrs.desc: Scale. You can set objects in the array to specify any number of scales.

attrs.name: tasks
attrs.desc: Setting a data set; Set the task item, including links (the type of the link dependency) and data (data)

attrs.name: skin
attrs.desc: Set the skin of the Gantt chart

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Set the width of the Gantt chart. If this parameter is not set, the width of the Gantt chart is adaptive. ;Set the width of the Gantt chart
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 500px.

events.name: ready
events.desc: Event triggered after Gantt chart rendering is complete
